Smart door handle: Develop a door handle that incorporates a small screen or display, allowing you to check the weather, news, or other important information without having to stop and check your phone. This could be especially useful for people who are always in a hurry.

Door-mounted mirror: Install a mirror on the door frame, allowing you to check your appearance before leaving the house or entering a room. This could be especially useful for people who are always in a hurry and don't have time to check themselves in a mirror before leaving.

Door-mounted speaker: Install a small speaker on the door frame, allowing you to listen to music or other audio while you open or close the door. This could be a great way to add some ambiance to a room or to listen to music while you're on the go.

Door-mounted plant holder: Install a small planter on the door frame, allowing you to grow a small plant or herb right in your home. This could be a great way to add some greenery to a room and to have a constant reminder of nature, even in a busy urban environment.

Door-mounted art display: Install a small shelf or display on the door frame, allowing you to showcase small pieces of art or other decorative items. This could be a great way to add some personality to a room and to showcase your personal style.
